doc:
Katie Leigh https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katie_Leigh 0 Katherine "Katie" Leigh (born December 16, 1958) is an American voice actress, best known for her roles as Sunni Gummi in Disney's Adventures of the Gummi Bears, Zuzu in The Extraordinary Adventures of Poppy Cat, Alex in the first two seasons of Totally Spies!, and as Connie Kendall in the Focus on the Family radio program Adventures in Odyssey since 1987. She has voice acted in both television, film and occasionally video game roles. Katherine_"_Katie_"_Leigh ( born December_16_,_1958 ) is an_American_voice_actress , best_known for her_roles as Sunni_Gummi in Disney 's_Adventures of the_Gummi_Bears , Zuzu in The_Extraordinary_Adventures of Poppy_Cat , Alex in the_first_two_seasons of Totally_Spies ! , and as Connie_Kendall in the_Focus on the_Family_radio_program_Adventures in Odyssey since 1987 . She has voice acted in both_television_,_film_and_occasionally_video_game_roles .
